data.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album Track 4 - Warriors of Fate - Demo
data.detailed_description:
Get inspired with the fourth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Warriors of Fate - Demo"!

This track serves as the opening number for Warriors of Fate, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
